title: Where to watch Succession: Stream every season online
author: sarah-rogers
summary: A brilliant dark comedy with terrifically terrible characters
article: The Emmy award-winning TV show follows Logan Roy, owner of the Waystar RoyCo media empire, and his family in this darkly witty, satirical drama. With all three of his children vying for control as Logan's health begins to decline, get ready for season 3 which is just around the corner and catch up by reading on about where to watch Succession online from anywhere.

Succession’s first two seasons have been a huge hit with viewers gripped by the mega-wealthy, incredibly dysfunctional Roy family. From recovering addict Kendall to political strategist Siobhan, as well as Roman, the youngest (and, admittedly, most immature) of the siblings.
Critics have praised the nuanced writing and the balance of comedy and drama, with audiences eagerly tuning in week after week for the dramatic storylines.

If you can’t resist a dark comedy and love a cast of terrible but fun-to-watch characters, you will want to watch Succession. The second season won the Emmy award for Outstanding Drama Series, as well as Best Actor for Jeremy Strong as Kendall Roy and Outstanding Writing for a Drama Series for the season two finale.

With season 3 landing from October 17 with nine all-new episodes, get caught up or remind yourself of our turbulent journey so far. In this guide, we tell you where to watch Succession in the US on HBO Max and how to stream the show in the UK, Australia, and Canada.

headers.5: Where to watch Succession: stream every season online in Australia
